scenario_text.value: Phew! So, this is where it comes out!
Hurray! It’s so bright out here!
It feels like ages since I last saw the sun.

Maybe it’s been longer since we got dumped
underground than we realized.
Miyuki, is it too bright?
Bright...

Hoho! I must say, it’s a little bright for me
as well.
So, what’s our next move?
We go back to Miu and get her to come with us.
Yes, that’s really our only option.

You think we’ll be able to with the way she’s
been acting?

She didn’t seem like she was interested in
hearing any more from us.

Miu can be real stubborn when she makes up
her mind. She isn’t going to want to listen.
But what else can we do?

If only there was some way we could get her
to listen...
Hey, what if we won over Shakomon?
Uh, you mean, got her on our side?
Don’t you think that’ll be even harder?

But remember how Shakomon tried to stop Miu
just before she activated the trap?
It could be worth a shot.
Well, I wish you the best of luck.
I believe I’d better return to the castle.
Wait, Jijimon!
Yes?

It, uh, sounds like you’ve been looking out
for Miu,

and you helped guide us all the way here,
so...thanks.
Oh, don’t mention it.

All right, everybody! Let’s go pay Miu
another visit!
Takuma, wait!
Aoi? What’s wrong?

Yeah, seriously? You look surprised by
something. What are you looking at...?
Wait, what?! It’s those little guys...
Uwaaah! Uwaaah!
Help! I’m scared!
The ones who said they were Miu’s servants?
Hm? Well, if it isn’t Palmon and Patamon.
Have they been following us?!
No...I don’t think so. Aren’t they acting weird?
Yeah, they seem totally panicked.
Run away!
Enemy attack!
What? Hey, what’s going on?!

Huh? Oh, it’s you! Well, we’ve got bigger
things to worry about right now!

An even more dangerous group of enemies is
here!
What?!
Who is it? Who’s here?!
The kidnappers! They’re after the queen!

They came out of nowhere, surrounding the
park and pouring in from every direction!

We faced them down back by the throne, but
the queen’s servants were all done for!
You think it’s them?!

It certainly sounds like Archnemon and her
minions.
You’ve gotta be kidding me!
Talk about bad timing!

This can’t be happening... You mean we’ve got
to go up against them again?
You can’t be serious! This is such crap!
D-d-don’t b-be so scared, Ryo!

Why wouldn’t I be scared?! Archnemon is
seriously bad news!
So they’re attacking in order to get to Miu?!
Yes! They’re after the queen!

But we shouldn’t be standing here talking
like this! We need to run away!
Hey, wait!

This is bad! Miu’s in danger! I have to go
save her!

Wait! Are you just going to abandon those
poor little things?

Didn’t you hear? The kidnappers are after
Miu!

Yes. If they’re after the human child, Palmon
and the others shouldn’t come to much harm.

Rushing to Her Rowdiness’s side may be for
the best.

B-but shouldn’t we at least come up with some
kind of strategy?
Ascertain the enemy’s number and position...

Yeah, and didn’t they say Miu’s servants were
all done for?

They may already have her. In which case, we
should prioritize our own safety—

We don’t have time to argue about this! Miu’s
life is on the line!

(What now? This is the worst possible time
for us to be divided!)
Come on, there’s no time! We have to go now!
Takuma, what’s your take?

You’ve always got the most level-headed
opinion. What should we do?
I, uh...
(I don’t have time to think this over.)

(I do think it’s probably best to prioritize
saving Miu, but then again...)

(It’s really dangerous to move with no idea
where the enemy might be.)

(So do we prioritize gaining intel? Or do we
put our own safety first?)

Takuma! Don’t just stand there, say
something!
(What should be our first priority?!)
Rescuing Miu.
Our own safety.
Gathering information.
Rescuing Miu.

I think our top priority should be to rescue
Miu.
Yeah, sure, but...

If this really is Archnemon again, she’ll
offer Miu as a sacrifice!
Once that happens, we’ll be too late!
I’m with Takuma!
B-but...

Minoru, I realize you may be scared, but
I will protect you without fail.
Trust me.

Heh...heheh! I...I’m not scared! I was
just...joking!
(Minoru’s really shaking now...)
Takuma, Minoru...I owe you.
Our own safety.

If we all rush in to save her and get caught,
we won’t do anyone any good.

Maybe it’s best if we prioritize our own
safety.
You think we’ve got time for that?!
Yeah, Kaito’s right!

Besides, this place has gotta be full of
enemies by now. Probably nowhere’s safe!
Well, no, but—

Please, Takuma, I don’t want to just abandon
Miu.
She’s probably terrified right now.
Yeah! Let’s go save her!

Okay, okay! If you all say so, let’s make
rescuing Miu our top priority!

All right, but everybody be careful and stay
on the alert!

Don’t worry, Shuuji...I’ll be right there
with you.

Hey, this is an emergency! Don’t go biting
off more than you can chew!
Gathering information.

What if we got a bunch of intel on the enemy
to help us safely rescue Miu?

Uh, do you really think that’s what we should
be doing right now?

Yeah, it’d be one thing if the enemy hadn’t
attacked yet, but now it’s too late!

B-but if we just charge in blindly, we’ll be
in danger!

I should think Her Rowdiness is the one in
the most danger right now.
Well, uh—

Yeah...you’re right. It must be terrifying
for her to be on her own right now.

If we’re not going to save her, what’s the
point?
Minoru!

Takuma! I changed my mind! We have to go save
Miu!
Minoru...
All right! Let’s get in there and save her!
Thank you... Thank you all.

Jijimon, thanks for all your help! We’re
going to hurry back to Miu!
Not so fast! What about those two?!
(Oh, he means Haru and Miyuki.)
Don’t worry. My sister and I will keep up.
Keep up...

Hmm... No, I don’t like it! I’d better go
with you!

All right, let’s hurry back to the throne
room!

Sorry guys, but I’m gonna need your help just
a bit longer!

This sucks. These guys are such bad news.
I can’t believe we’re taking them on again.
Yeah, I know.

I don’t want Miu to have to go through what
I experienced yesterday.
Kew!

Heh! Yeah...you’re right. We’ve just gotta do
this!
